name: Artisan
description: You began mopping floors and scrubbing counters in an artisan's workshop for a few coppers per day as soon as you were strong enough to carry a bucket. Eventually you learned your trade and became a googled artisan in your own right.

features.name: Crafter
features.description: You gain proficiency with three Artisan's Tools of your choice. Items you craft with tools cost 20% less, and you can craft items during a Long Rest.
